name: Quest (JuanPabloHDZM)
description:
Getting started

Enjoy this  action RPG . The objective is to kill all the enemies in the floor to open the portal to the next one. I hope you like it, feel free to leave any comment 

Instructions
  • Kill all the enemies in the level.
  • If you die you will have to repeat the level.
  • You will need an xbox controller to play with, the corresponding buttons to the actions are shown infront of the UI.
